name: Opening Times UK
author: all-opening-times.co.uk

sections.description:
This plugin adds a searchbox for store hours. By filling out the “what?” and “where?” the user will get all the hours, contact details and more.

Millions of Store Hours

This plugin hosts one of the nations largest directories for opening times within the UK.
Applying a user-generated concept, all information is accurately submitted by all-opening-times scouts
who care about helping you find store hours fast! Search for the opening times of your favorite
or nearby stores, including big box retailers and local boutiques. With this plugin, we hope you ll never face closed doors again!
sections.installation:
1. Install & activate the plugin
  2. Go to the dynamic sidebar option (Design -> Sidebar)
  3. Drag and drop the Widget “OpeningTimesUK” to your sidebar.

That`s it.
sections.faq: For any questions pleas just ask at info@all-opening-times.co.uk

short_description: Your visitors will be able to look-up Opening Times within the UK with this plugin.
